Other ingredients: Acacia gum, modified cellulose gum, colloidal silicon dioxide, stearic acid and magnesium stearate. Contains soy. Suggested Use: 3 tablets with 8 ounces of water three times daily, 30 minutes before meals. WARNING: Do not use if you are pregnant, may become pregnant, or breastfeeding. Potassium iodide and bladderwrack are rich in iodine. Those on iodine restricted diet should not use this product. Keep out of the reach of children.
